name: BLIT2/B1OCK
description:
Desktop version available in downloads.There is some minor audio clipping on Chrome.

BLIT2/B1OCK is a sort of shoot-em-up where instead of shooting you must split off part of you to attack. When you are combined with your other half you are invulnerable to bullets but unable to attack. Splitting lets you take the offensive but your main body is defenseless when split! Also, when you are split you must watch your energy or else you'll leave your attacking half stranded when you're out! This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together."

How To Play
  • W,A,S,D to move around
  • Left click to split and shoot off your attacking half
  • Hold shift to move slower (only really useful for the boss)
  • Hold right click (or space) to recall your split half back to you
    • NOTE: If playing on web it's highly recommended you use space to recall since right click on the browser will sometimes open the context menu
  • You are invulnerable when combined and you also absorb shots and increase your stored energy for every shot absorbed
  • When split off the energy gauge will drain as long as you are split in attack mode; recalling does not drain energy
  • If you run out of energy your attacking half will no longer move and recalling it will have a heavy move speed penalty
